programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Segredos, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Toni descobre que o seu novo amigo, um talentoso agente livre, está sendo forçado a ajudar contrabandistas perigosos a roubar tesouros nacionais de uma caverna subaquática.

programme.title: Tudo Pela Honra, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Segredos, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Toni descobre que o seu novo amigo, um talentoso agente livre, está sendo forçado a ajudar contrabandistas perigosos a roubar tesouros nacionais de uma caverna subaquática.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Screwball)
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Danger: Diabolik, (1968, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The suave thief called Diabolik can’t get enough of life’s good – or glittery – things. Not when there are currency shipments to steal from under the noses of government officials and priceless jewels to lift from the boudoirs of the rich.

programme.title: Planet Of The Vampires, (1965, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Get sucked into a chilling black hole of creepiness when an alien race zeroes in on a crew of unsuspecting astronauts, turning them into zombies! Packed with space-age suspense, this cult-classic thriller drips with a feverish atmosphere of dread.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty, (1947, Comedy)
programme.desc: A clumsy daydreamer gets caught up in a sinister conspiracy.

programme.title: Hobson's Choice, (1954, Comedy)
programme.desc: Widower Henry Hobson is a successful bootmaker and a tyrannical father of three daughters who all want to leave him by getting married, but he refuses because marriage traditions require him to pay out settlements.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Killer Elite, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: Redemption, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Chaos, (2005, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A brilliant thief has masterminded a series of high-stake bank heists, and for two detectives, the only hope for survival is finding an order to the chaos.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When a news crew decides to trail a brave fire-fighting team, they never suspect that the first call for help they respond to that night may be their last. Now they're trapped in an apartment complex sealed off by the government. Rating: R

programme.title: Quarantine 2: Terminal, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: Earlier tonight, a bizarre disease was unleashed in a run-down Los Angeles tenement... and no one got out alive. Yet something escaped. Now, aboard Flight 318, the first symptoms begin to show. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Carrie, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Angela Bettis stars in this adaptation of Stephen King's classic tale of horror. Carrie White has been cursed with the power of telekinesis and when her tormenters commit an act of unforgivable humiliation, they'll soon learn a deadly lesson.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Naruto is incensed at the way Tsunade disrespects the position of Hokage and challenges her to a fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto practices hard so he can win the necklace from Tsunade. Meanwhile, Tsunade is in a dilemma over Orochimaru’s offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Gripped by the desire to see Nawaki and Dan, Tsunade almost succumbs to Orochimaru’s tempting offer.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto’s ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Having achieved godlike status as a late-night TV personality, Wayne (Mike Myers) now confronts the question that has plagued man for centuries: Is there life after cable?

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Wayne's World, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: When a sleazy TV exec offers Wayne and Garth a contract to tape their late-night cable-access show at his network, they discover the road to the big time is full of gnarly twists and turns.

programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: Basic Instinct, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: San Francisco detective Nick Curran is investigating the murder of a once-celebrated rock star, and he's made a few unsettling discoveries: a bloody ice pick, a white silk scarf tied to a bedpost, and evidence of an otherwise romantic evening.

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: When a power-crazed despot schemes to buy California from Mexico, it takes two Zorros--the legendary Don Diego de la Vega and his chosen successor Alejandro Murrieta, a dashing bandit-turned-hero-- to defeat the tyrant's unscrupulous plans.

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Screwball)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers’ comedic genius shines when the hapless Inspector Clouseau is presumed to be dead. However, the very much alive Inspector travels to Hong Kong to investigate a dangerous drug lord (Robert Webber). Dyan Cannon and Herbert Lom also star.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: Bad News Bears in Breaking Training, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story picks up the Bears career a year after their infamous second-place finish in the North Valley League. Faced with a chance to play the Houston Toros for a shot at the Japanese champs, they devise a way to get Texas to play at the famed Astrodome.

programme.title: Bad News Bears Go To Japan, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Caught in a clash of cultures and ready to wreak more havoc on Japan than Godzilla, the Bad News Bears are back this time the Bears are spirited off to Tokyo by a slick and sleazy con artist who sees in the team a perfect peg for a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and they’ve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Music)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Boy in the Plastic Bubble, (1976, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The girl next door makes a teen (John Travolta) born with immune deficiencies want to leave his germ-free bubble.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 4 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally… another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Téa squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he’s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally regain their memories, but a much larger challenge looms on the horizon. The mysterious thief is about to transform into something even more powerful!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The last counterattack by the memory thief who reveals his true colors!

programme.title: A terrible storm leads to another run in with the devious Captain Foxy! When Luffy makes the dangerous decision to help his old foe, it could spell disaster for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and his mates must survive another outrageous battle aboard Captain Foxy’s booby-trapped boat, and even if they survive, something far worse awaits them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The guy who's the closest to invincible? And the most dangerous man!

programme.title: The Straw Hats take time out to help a group of hungry castaways, but trouble looms on the horizon. An icy marine adversary is out to track down Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Navy headquarters admiral aokiji! The ferocity of an ultimate powerhouse!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp work feverishly to save Robin from her icy tomb, and Luffy looks to settle the score with Admiral Aokiji in a man-to-man fight to the finish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel between rubber and ice! Luffy vs. Aokiji!

programme.title: An encounter with a giant swimming frog leads to a close call with a seafaring train! Next up for the Straw Hats: drop anchor at a town full of water and seek out a shipwright!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The dashing sea train and the city of water, water seven!

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, and Nami take a wild ride through Water Seven in search of a shipwright. Meanwhile, Chopper and Robin get separated during their quest to find a bookstore!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Adventure in the city on the water! Head to the mammoth shipbuilding plant!

programme.title: Zoro is attacked by thugs who want to cash in on his bounty, Sanji gets lost on a grocery shopping expedition, and three suitcases full of cash mysteriously go missing!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A carpenter and his talking pigeon help recover the Straw Hats’ missing money, but the Franky Family won’t give up so easily. Luffy and Nami receive very bad news about their beloved boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Galley-la company! A grand sight: dock #1!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami refuse to believe that the Going Merry’s seaworthy days are finished, but for now, bigger problems loom on the horizon! Their money is missing again, along with Usopp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pirate abduction incident! A pirate ship that can only await her end!

programme.title: Usopp bravely tries to recover the stolen money, but the Franky Family has him badly outnumbered. Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper set out on a rescue mission, but they’ll need Luffy to even the odds!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rescuing our friend! Raid on the franky house!

programme.title: Usopp regains consciousness after his vicious beating, but he’s not at all happy to hear Luffy’s plans for the Going Merry. Temper flares and challenges are issued as the Straw Hats face their most uncertain hour.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big fight under the moon! The pirate flag flutters with sorrow!

programme.title: Luffy and Usopp battle to a brutal standstill in a heartbreaking duel between men who once called each other family. Can the Straw Hats find the strength to carry on without their sniper?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy vs. Usopp! Collision of two men's pride!

programme.title: The Straw Hat split is overshadowed by an assassination attempt on the mayor of Water Seven! Luffy is eager to investigate, but the leader of the Franky Family is about to reappear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Severe shock hits the city of water! Iceberg targeted!

programme.title: Luffy’s grudge match with Franky gets serious when his opponent turns out to be a cyborg! Iceberg awakes from his slumber only to hurl heinous accusations at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy is branded an assassin and attacked by Iceberg’s strongest men! Meanwhile, Sanji and Chopper attempt to warn Usopp about an impending natural disaster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates are the culprits? The protectors of the city of water!

programme.title: The citizens of Water Seven search for the Straw Hats and a devastating storm threatens to sink the city. Chopper and Sanji pick up Robin’s trail, but they aren’t prepared for what they’ll find.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Eternal farewell? Nico robin: the woman who draws darkness!

programme.title: Usopp prepares to ride out the storm aboard the Going Merry, Franky hatches a plan to force Luffy into a rematch, and the Straw Hats set out to uncover Robin’s dark secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture robin! The determination of the straw hats!

programme.title: Robin and her CP9 brethren seek to settle unfinished business with Iceberg. The Straw Hats have a plan to clear their names, but the assassins are one step ahead of them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire is the signal! Cp9 goes into action!

programme.title: Luffy makes his long-awaited entrance, Iceberg has a shocking surprise in store for Robin, and the true identities of the masked assassins of CP9 are finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cp9 takes off their masks! Their shocking true faces!

programme.title: CP9 listens to Iceberg’s blood to learn the location of the blueprints, Usopp has another run-in with Franky and the remaining Straw Hats – plus a new friend – race to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the gang come face to face with Robin and her CP9 comrades. The rubberman is prepared to fight for his friend, but he’s never faced foes like this!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Come back, Robin! Showdown with cp9!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami are sent hurtling toward their deaths by the villains of CP9! Meanwhile, Usopp forges an unlikely friendship with Franky while waiting out a storm.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The straw hat pirates annihilated? The menace of the leopard model!

programme.title: Franky tries to convince Usopp that there’s no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper – inspired by a mysterious moment from the past – remains loyal to his beloved boat
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The man who is loved even by his ship! Usopp's tears!

programme.title: A look back at Franky’s past reveals the amazing origins of the sea train – and paints a vivid picture of his younger days, spent alongside Iceberg and the legendary shipwright Tom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Franky's past! The day the sea train first ran!

programme.title: Franky’s backstory continues! The sea train is a success, and it looks like Tom’s life is spared! Unfortunately, a government spy is searching for a reason to investigate Tom, and Franky provides the ammunition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam's scheme! The day the sea train shook!

programme.title: Tom does the unthinkable in an attempt to protect his apprentices, but young Franky is unable to control his rage, leading to a showdown with a spy – and a train!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The end of the legendary man! The day the sea train cried!

programme.title: Chopper’s heroism may mean the difference between life and death for Iceberg and Paulie, Nami learns the agonizing truth about Robin, and Sanji prepares to make his move!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The truth behind her betrayal! Robin's sorrowful decision!

programme.title: Nami makes a frantic dash for the Sea Train station, Chopper searches desperately for Zoro and Luffy, and Sanji plays it cool while waiting for the right time to spring into action.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The steam whistle forces friends apart! The sea train starts to run

programme.title: Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji barges in! Sea train battle in the storm!

programme.title: Chopper and Robin risk their own lives in a desperate attempt to save Luffy and Zoro from a monstrous wall of water! Meanwhile, Sanji moves ever closer to a reunion with Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's soul cries out! Straw hat luffy makes a comeback!

programme.title: Luffy and Nami ask to borrow a ship so they can chase down the sea train, but the weather is too severe to set sail. Lucky for them, Iceberg and his friends are full of surprises!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another sea train? Rocketman charges forth!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Daré had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Barbed Wire, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: In 1878, Gene Autry is a cattle buyer who tries to settle a battle between the cattlemen and homesteaders, when the latter are worked up into a feverish pitch by unscrupulous landowner Steve Rutledge.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Back in Texas, Capt. Call organizes a mustang drive to Montana. He hires a Gideon, a former Texas Ranger, to head the drive. Newt falls into trouble in is rescued by a crusty rancher named Dunnegan.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part I - The Vision

programme.title: Return To Lonesome Dove, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: Gideon's mustang drive encounters problems. Agostina must fend off the unwanted advances of cowboys. Call makes his way to Clara's ranch, and then moves on to Montana.
programme.sub-title: Return To Lonesome Dove: Part II - The Forge

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the Mugen Academy. They meet Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami's intelligence.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Cyprine manages to steal pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa's power and kidnaps her!
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.
programme.sub-title: The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Hotaru’s and Mistress 9’s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe to save Hotaru’s heart.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Shooting Star: Saturn and the Messiah

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.
programme.sub-title: A New Life: Parting of the Stars of Destiny

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.
programme.sub-title: A Guardian's Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa follows a beautiful light into the forest. The owner of that light is Pegasus and he asks Chibi-Usa to keep their meeting a secret.
programme.sub-title: Meeting of Destiny: The Night Pegasus Dances

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: In order to capture Pegasus as their first step in world conquest, Zirconia orders her subordinates to seek out people with beautiful dreams.
programme.sub-title: Super Transformation Once Again: Pegasus's Power

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having a taste for older woman, Hawk's Eye sets his sights on Usagi's mother, Ikuko.
programme.sub-title: Protect Mom's Dream: Double Moon's New Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger’s Eye approaches Naru in a plot to capture Pegasus in a subspace cage invented by Hawk’s Eye.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Two of Mamoru’s friends from college, Saori and Kobayashi, pay him a visit at his apartment in the hopes of meeting his girlfriend Usagi.
programme.sub-title: The Perfect Couple: Usagi and Mamoru's Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru is helping Usagi and Chibi-Usa with their studies when Luna and Artemis walk in, having a huge fight.
programme.sub-title: Artemis is Cheating? Enter the Mysterious Kitten

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls learn that Tomoko Takase, author of the best-selling book The Moon Night Pegasus, used to be Makoto's classmate from her previous school.
programme.sub-title: Makoto's Friendship: The Girl Who Admired Pegasus

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tiger's Eye hatches a plan to capture Pegasus by using a Lemures that can enter other people's shadow and control them from within.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small fire incident leaves Mamoru's apartment in a total mess, forcing him to stay at Rei's place for the time being.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa bumps into a young man after becoming enthralled in a beautiful illustration book she had Usagi buy for her.
programme.sub-title: Forest of Illusion: A Beautiful Fairy's Invitation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is shocked when she sees Mamoru coming out of his apartment with another woman.
programme.sub-title: Drive to the Heavens: The Dream Car Fueled with Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa befriends Miharu, who is aiming to be the best swordwoman in Japan.
programme.sub-title: Aiming for the Top: The Pretty Swordswoman's Dilemma

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Yoshiki Usui’s new store opens. Usagi and her friends head out to see the fashion show, along with Fish’s Eye, who is captivated by Usui's good looks.
programme.sub-title: We Love Fashion: The Stylish Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi spots Minako out on a date with a handsome man. To everyone's surprise, the boyfriend is different from the one Usagi saw earlier.
programme.sub-title: Storm of Love: Minako's Grand Two-Timing Plan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguard—especially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.
programme.sub-title: Shining Summer Days: Ami Under the Sea-Breeze

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa see an ad for a free ballet lesson and sign up. As they practice, Fish’s Eye draws the class's attention with his dancing skills.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa meet a woman named Rubina who follows them. Rubina is a princess who snuck out to experience life outside of her royal duties.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls attend the school festival. Makoto is asked to dance by a handsome man, who is actually Tiger's Eye in disguise.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Fish's Eye goes after Mamoru. But Mamoru seems to show no interest in being with anyone besides Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Shadow of Evil: The Trio's Last Chance

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Zirconia threatens the Amazon Trio that if they don’t capture Pegasus by the next new moon, the magic making them human will wear off.
programme.sub-title: Mirrors of Dreams: The Amazon's Last Stage

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to see a show at the Dead Moon Circus. But Momo starts acting peculiar and leaves, causing Chibi-Usa to become worried.
programme.sub-title: The Amazoness: Nightmare from Behind the Mirrors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami falls in love with a melody she finds online. She works on lyrics that match the melody and also goes to meet the composer, Toshiyuki Nishino.
programme.sub-title: True Power Explodes: Ami's Melody of the Heart

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei becomes famous after posing for a magazine. A girl named Nanako, expresses her desire to study under Rei so that she can become just like her.
programme.sub-title: Flames of Passion: Mars's Raging Super Attack

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Chibi-Usa go to the dentist to get their cavities treated. The dental clinic is actually a trap set up by Palla-Palla to find Pegasus.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto compete to win the heart of Honjo, a young principal. But their rivalry starts to put a strain on their friendship.
programme.sub-title: Clash of Dreams: Minako and Makoto's Broken Friendship

programme.desc: A conflict between black and Jewish gangsters in New York City and a case of mistaken identity land a man (Josh Hartnett) in the middle of a revenge plot of a crime boss (Morgan Freeman).

programme.title: A Simple Favor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Stephanie is a widowed single mother who works as a vlogger in Connecticut. When her best friend mysteriously disappears one day, Stephanie launches her own investigation by digging into the woman's past, finding a few surprises along the way.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Double-crosses and plot twists abound when a corrupt real-estate developer (Tim Robbins) decides not to pay a ransom to his wife's (Jennifer Aniston) kidnappers (John Hawkes, Yasiin Bey).

programme.title: Queenpins, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A housewife and her friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to the public. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector.

programme.desc: A high school junior (Hailee Steinfeld) develops an unexpected bond with a thoughtful teen (Hayden Szeto) after learning that her best friend (Haley Lu Richardson) is dating her older brother (Blake Jenner).

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Linha de Ação
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem é o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordâncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenções por trás da investigação encomendada.

programme.title: Breakdown - Implacável Perseguição
programme.desc: Um homem procura por sua esposa desaparecida depois que seu carro quebra no meio do deserto.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria.

programme.title: O Guardião
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo México para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresário. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgatá-la e protegê-la.

programme.title: Expresso do Amanhã
programme.desc: Os únicos sobreviventes estão a bordo de uma imensa máquina chamada Snowpiercer. Lá, os mais pobres vivem em condições terríveis, enquanto a classe rica é repleta de pessoas que se comportam como reis.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacável Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmão mais velho de Miguel e que também trabalha para o bandido, está desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito.

programme.title: Guerra Biológica
programme.desc: Um imunologista da CIA se aposenta e vai morar com sua filha numa cidadezinha distante. Quando um miliciano detona uma bomba biológica na região, cabe ao ex-agente evitar o pior e salvar as vidas de todos.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresário e um detetive da polícia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho à justiça.

programme.title: Perseguição Mortal
programme.desc: O ladrão realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psicótico, Temple. O plano corre bem até que o ladrão descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grávida de Temple, Mia.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito.

programme.title: Fantasmas de Guerra
programme.desc: Cinco experientes soldados americanos são designados para defender um castelo francês perto do final da Segunda Guerra Mundial.

programme.title: Até o Final
programme.desc: Para melhorar sua relação, um pai resolve levar sua filha para acampar quando são surpreendidos por um apocalipse zumbi. Agora, ele fará de tudo para lutar contra a onda de mortos e salvar sua família.

programme.title: Refém do Espírito
programme.desc: Ainda que em legítima defesa, Marnie Watson é sentenciada por matar o marido, mas recebe liberdade condicional sob a condição de usar uma tornozeleira eletrônica.

programme.title: Olhos Famintos
programme.desc: Um irmão e uma irmã dirigindo para casa pelo campo isolado para as férias de primavera encontram uma criatura carnívora no meio de sua farra ritualística.

programme.title: Amityville, O Terror
programme.desc: Todd e a família estão passando por momentos difíceis e resolvem ir morar na nova casa de Shae, em Amityville.

programme.title: JACK: A Caixa Maldita
programme.desc: Quando um brinquedo antigo é doado a um museu localizado no coração de uma floresta, não demora muito para a funcionária Casey Reynolds acreditar que o palhaço sinistro de dentro da caixa tem vida própria.

programme.title: A Casa Silenciosa
programme.desc: Uma jovem fica presa dentro do refúgio à beira do lago de sua família e se torna incapaz de entrar em contato com o mundo exterior enquanto forças sobrenaturais assombram a casa com energias e consequências misteriosas.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvação
programme.desc: Alex Corvis é um jovem injustamente condenado à cadeira elétrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mágico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: O Principal Suspeito
programme.desc: Sem dinheiro, o estudante Martin vira vigia noturno no necrotério da cidade, mas o tranquilo trabalho se torna aterrorizante quando um assassino em série passa a deixar pistas que apontam para ele.

programme.title: Sobreviva a noite
programme.desc: Um intenso filme de ação, que traz Dolph Lundgren como um agente da Interpol protegendo sua esposa e filha de um criminoso implacável e seus mercenários em um vilarejo italiano.

programme.title: Submundo
programme.desc: Quando os detetives da cidade grande se recusam a continuar investigando o assassinato do seu irmão mais novo cometido pela própria gangue, o xerife de uma cidade pequena se disfarça para encontrar o assassino do irmão e vingar a sua morte.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: Beijos que Matam
programme.desc: Um policial de Los Angeles procura um cafetão que sequestrou a filha de um imigrante japonês.

programme.title: Desastre das Cobras: O Ataque na Ilha das Cobras
programme.desc: Um grupo de funcionários da revista Geographic chega a uma ilha deserta no Sudeste Asiático para preparar um novo espetáculo. O líder da expedição esconde dos colegas que veio aqui para encontrar o pai, desaparecido há muitos anos.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcação militar em busca de um submersível não identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubarão gigante, forçado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Terremoto
programme.desc: Quando uma série de terremotos começa a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas ruínas da cidade na esperança de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhões de vidas.

programme.title: A Invasão
programme.desc: Depois que sua pequena cidade australiana é aniquilada por um ataque aéreo avassalador, um grupo de civis foge da captura e descobre que agora estão entre os últimos sobreviventes de uma invasão extraterrestre que engolfou todo o planeta.

programme.title: A Invasão - Ocupação Alienígena
programme.desc: Dois anos após a aterrissagem de alienígenas na Terra, os sobreviventes de Sydney, Austrália, lutam em uma guerra desesperada enquanto o número de mortos continua a aumentar. Uma última batalha é a esperança da humanidade.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulcão
programme.desc: Quando um avião comercial fica preso dentro de um círculo de vulcões em erupção, os passageiros e a tripulação precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: Assassinos Anônimos
programme.desc: A tensão está insuportável dentro do Assassinos Anônimos, um grupo de apoio para matadores, quando todos estão tentando descobrir qual deles está por trás de um atentado contra um importante senador

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas não demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Além do Troféu
programme.desc: A história da obsessão dos homens pelo poder e até onde eles irão às vezes reivindicar o "Prêmio".

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Daniels não demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: Remake de um filme de 1956, no qual o plano de um escritor para expor um promotor público corrupto toma um rumo inesperado.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Aliança Mortal
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Dickie Roberts: O Pestinha Cresceu
programme.desc: Desesperado para reviver sua carreira, Dickie faz uma audição para um papel no filme de Rob Reiner, mas o diretor não acredita que Dickie seja normal o suficiente para interpretar o papel.

programme.title: Os Fanáticos
programme.desc: Um grupo de fãs de Star Wars viaja para o Rancho Skywalker para roubar uma cópia de "A Ameaça Fantasma", para que um amigo doente terminal possa assistir antes de ser lançado nos cinemas vários meses depois.

programme.title: A Promoção
programme.desc: Dois sub-gerentes de uma rede de supermercados disputam uma promoção cobiçada.

programme.title: Deus nos Acuda!
programme.desc: Entrega especial para fãs de comédia! Greg Kinnear (Auto Focus) estrela este filme agradável dirigido por Garry Marshall (Uma Linda Mulher) sobre um trapaceiro sem nenhum valor que passa a se dar bem.

programme.title: Um Vampiro no Brooklyn
programme.desc: O excêntrico vampiro Maximillian viaja até Nova York para procurar uma esposa e dar continuidade à sua linhagem. Lá ele conhece a bela detetive Rita que ele acredita ser a descendente de uma ordem de vampiros.

programme.title: A Família
programme.desc: Um chefe da máfia e sua família são transferidos para uma pacata cidade na França sob o programa de proteção a testemunhas depois de delatar a máfia.

programme.title: Um Novo Amor
programme.desc: George e Edith não tem nada em comum, exceto pelo fato de que seus filhos podem estudar no mesmo local, a Universidade de Middlleton. Acompanhando os rebentos, eles escapam da tediosa excursão pelo campus e rapidamente estabelecem uma conexão especial.

programme.title: O Príncipe das Mulheres
programme.desc: O executivo de marketing Marcus Graham é um mulherengo dedicado à boa vida, à liberdade e à felicidade da conquista. Isso tudo até ele conhecer uma mulher elegante e esperta que trata os homens da mesma forma que ele trata as mulheres.

programme.title: Minha Melhor Amiga
programme.desc: A rela��o de um homem com sua melhor amiga � colocada � prova quando ela se casa e ele � obrigado a enfrentar seus verdadeiros sentimentos.

programme.title: A Teoria do Amor
programme.desc: O mundo inteiro conhece a genialidade científica de Einstein. Mas será que conhece seu lado casamenteiro? É o que irá nos mostrar A Teoria do Amor, que resulta numa "comédia romântica divertida e adorável" elogiada pelo público e pela crítica.

programme.title: Amor em Ritmo de Dança
programme.desc: Uma professora de inglês aborrecida com sua própria vida, conhece um campeão de dança, uma conexão instantânea se forma entre eles. Os dois precisam afastar todos os obstáculos para focar seu objetivo: ganhar o título mundial de dança.

programme.title: Encalhados
programme.desc: Megan de 28 anos, vai a um reencontro de amigos da escola e percebe que sua vida continua a mesma de 10 anos atrás. Porém, ao receber um pedido de casamento de seu namorado, ela entra em crise.

programme.title: Outono em Nova York
programme.desc: Will Keane um playboy cinquentão que tem como promessa nunca ter um compromisso sério com uma mulher. Quando ele conhece Charlotte Fielding ,imagina que terá com ela outro rápido e fácil romance. Mas nada no relacionamento de ambos é fácil ou rápido.

programme.title: A Bela Fera
programme.desc: Isabelle, uma beleza apenas no exterior, conhece Jeremy, um homem áspero que se esconde do seu passado.

programme.title: O Natal dos Coopers
programme.desc: Os vencedores do Oscar® Diane Keaton, Alan Arkin e Marisa Tomei junto com o vencedor do Globo de Ouro® John Goodman e Ed Helms, Amanda Seyfried e Olivia Wilde estrelam nesta comédia divertida e comovente.

programme.title: Ritmo Quente
programme.desc: De 17 anos, está de férias com sua família em um resort nas montanhas, quando ela é atraída para os alojamentos dos funcionários, ouvindo música. Lá ela conhece Johnny, o instrutor de dança do hotel, e eles se apaixonam apesar dos avisos de todos.

programme.title: O Pretendente
programme.desc: Década de 1920. Após fazer um anúncio prometendo um dote generoso, um pai encontra um marido para sua filha. Será que o casamento arranjado poderá se transformar em amor verdadeiro?

programme.title: Um Último Beijo
programme.desc: Até que a morte nos separe - não foi tempo suficiente para o casal Max e Abby, pois ele acabou falecendo de maneira inesperada ainda jovem.

programme.title: Entre o Céu e o Inferno
programme.desc: Neste conto de amor, o indicado ao Oscar® Samuel L. Jackson e Christina Ricci buscam a redenção no sul por meio do poder do blues e da transcendência de uma amizade improvável.

programme.title: O Duelo
programme.desc: Um Ranger do Texas está investigando uma série de mortes inexplicáveis em uma cidade chamada Helena.

programme.title: O Sequestro do Ônibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai não tem meios para pagar o tratamento médico da filha. Como último recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas dão errado, eles são forçados a sequestrar um ônibus da cidade.

programme.title: Um Tira Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Dave Brown nunca se preocupou muito com a ética em seu trabalho. Este policial agressivo, racista, misógino e egoísta prefere agredir os suspeitos antes mesmo que sejam julgados, incluindo um homem acusado de estuprar mulheres durante encontros amorosos

programme.title: Fronteira
programme.desc: Um mexicano decide atravessar ilegalmente a fronteira dos Estados Unidos, no momento de sua travessia, ele percebe tiros em sua direção. O homem consegue escapar, mas uma mulher que passava pelo local é morta.

programme.title: A Árvore Da Vida
programme.desc: A história de uma família em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocência e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: A Pistola é Minha Bíblia
programme.desc: Após um violento assalto a uma diligência, com muitos tiros e ação explosiva, dois pistoleiros Tim e Larry, aparecem do nada, sem nenhuma informação sobre seu passado.

programme.title: Jake Grandão
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: No Rastro da Morte
